title: Warming up to Graphs
summary: Graphs are a powerful data structure and are increasingly relevant for today's social and data-centric applications. This talk offers a brief overview of Graphs, Graph theory, and explores scenarios where using a Graph database (particularly Neo4j) can be of great benefit.
